data.lyric:
[ti:cardigan]

[al:folklore]

[00:00.00]cardigan - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.35]Written by：Taylor Swift/Aaron Dessner
[00:00.71]© 2020 TASRM Publishing, administered by：Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI), Ingrid Stella Music, administered by SonyATV Tunes LLC (ASCAP)
[00:01.07]All Rights Reserved. Used by Permission.
[00:01.30]Produced by：Aaron Dessner
[00:01.44]Recorded by：Jonathan Low and Aaron Dessner at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:01.93]Vocals recorded by：Laura Sisk at the Kitty Committee Studio (Los Angeles, CA)
[00:02.41]Additional recording by：Aaron Dessner at Gaite Lyrique (Paris, FR) and Bella Blasko on tour with The National (Stuttgart, DE)
[00:03.15]Mixed by：Jonathan Low at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:03.52]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:03.90]Drum Programming, Percussion, Piano, Bass, Electric Guitars, Mellotron and Synthesizers by：Aaron Dessner (Paris, FR and Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:04.60]Orchestration by：Bryce Dessner (Biarritz, FR)
[00:04.82]Modular Synth by：Benjamin Lanz (Paris, FR) recorded by Bella Blasko
[00:05.23]Trombone by：Dave Nelson (Bone Hollow Recording; Accord, NY) recorded by Dave Nelson
[00:05.72]Drum Programming by：James McAlister (Los Angeles, CA) recorded by James McAlister
[00:06.16]Viola and Violin by：Yuki Numata Resnick (Buffalo, NY) recorded by Kyle Resnick
[00:06.64]Cello by：Clarice Jensen (Brooklyn, NY) recorded by Clarice Jensen
[00:07.01]Vintage tee brand new phone
[00:10.09]
[00:10.75]High heels on cobblestones
[00:14.37]When you are young they assume you know nothing
[00:21.66]Sequin smile black lipstick
[00:25.42]Sensual politics
[00:29.11]When you are young they assume you know nothing
[00:36.34]But I knew you
[00:38.32]Dancing in your Levi's
[00:40.35]Drunk under a streetlight
[00:43.93]I knew you
[00:45.78]Hand under my sweatshirt
[00:47.58]Baby kiss it better
[00:51.19]And when I felt like I was an old cardigan under someone's bed
[00:58.70]You put me on and said I was your favorite
[01:05.84]A friend to all is a friend to none
[01:09.76]Chase two girls lose the one
[01:13.43]When you are young they assume you know nothing
[01:20.69]But I knew you
[01:22.65]Playing hide-and-seek and
[01:24.50]Giving me your weekends
[01:28.20]I knew you
[01:29.86]Your heartbeat on the High Line
[01:31.76]Once in twenty lifetimes
[01:35.58]And when I felt like I was an old cardigan under someone's bed
[01:42.99]You put me on and said I was your favorite
[02:03.07]To kiss in cars and downtown bars
[02:06.80]Was all we needed
[02:10.76]You drew stars around my scars
[02:14.21]But now I'm bleeding
[02:19.78]Cause I knew you
[02:21.73]Stepping on the last train
[02:23.50]Marked me like a bloodstain
[02:27.30]I knew you
[02:29.06]Tried to change the ending
[02:30.85]Peter losing Wendy
[02:34.61]I knew you
[02:36.46]Leaving like a father
[02:38.36]Running like water
[02:41.96]When you are young they assume you know nothing
[02:47.32]But I knew you'd linger like a tattoo kiss
[02:51.09]I knew you'd haunt all of my what-ifs
[02:54.78]The smell of smoke would hang around this long
[02:58.57]Cause I knew everything when I was young
[03:02.11]I knew I'd curse you for the longest time
[03:06.00]Chasing shadows in the grocery line
[03:09.60]I knew you'd miss me once the thrill expired
[03:13.19]And you'd be standing in my front porch light
[03:16.60]And I knew you'd come back to me
[03:20.85]You'd come back to me
[03:24.34]And you'd come back to me
[03:27.96]And you'd come back
[03:33.74]And when I felt like I was an old cardigan
[03:37.85]Under someone's bed
[03:41.10]You put me on and said I was your favorite

[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]

[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权

[00:07.01]复古t恤 全新手机
[00:10.75]穿着高跟鞋踩在崎岖不平的鹅卵石路上
[00:14.37]在你懵懂年少时 世人总认定你一无所知
[00:21.66]粲然的微笑 气场强大的黑色口红
[00:25.42]耐人寻味的斡旋技巧
[00:29.11]在你乳臭未干时 世人总认定你少不更事
[00:36.34]但我了解你
[00:38.32]穿着牛仔裤悠悠起舞
[00:40.35]在昏暗的街灯下醉意醺醺
[00:43.93]我了解你
[00:45.78]悄悄把手放进我的运动衫里
[00:47.58]宝贝 尽情热吻吧
[00:51.19]当我觉得自惭形秽 犹如被人丢弃在床下的旧羊毛衫时
[00:58.70]你欺骗我 说我是你的最爱
[01:05.84]不懂得拒绝取舍 何来专属拥有
[01:09.76]白玫瑰还是红玫瑰 总会留有遗憾
[01:13.43]在你懵懂年少时 世人总认定你一无所知
[01:20.69]但我了解你
[01:22.65]玩着捉迷藏般的小把戏
[01:24.50]为我留出你周末的时间
[01:28.20]我了解你
[01:29.86]你无法遏制的极速心跳
[01:31.76]一生唯一次的爱 竟不知 相识短暂瞬息还是已数十载
[01:35.58]当我觉得自惭形秽 犹如被人丢弃在床下的旧羊毛衫时
[01:42.99]你欺骗我 说我是你的最爱
[02:03.07]是在车里 是在市区的酒吧 你我忘情拥吻
[02:06.80]夫复何求呢
[02:10.76]你曾在我伤疤旁绘上星辰来安慰我
[02:14.21]可如今我真的受伤流血 你在哪里呢
[02:19.78]因为我了解你
[02:21.73]决然奔上最后一班列车
[02:23.50]徒留伤痕累累的我
[02:27.30]我了解你
[02:29.06]曾试图改变结局
[02:30.85]感觉就像彼得丢了温迪
[02:34.61]我了解你
[02:36.46]像父亲般留下离开的背影
[02:38.36]像河流般匆匆奔向远方
[02:41.96]在你懵懂年少时 世人总认定你一无所知
[02:47.32]但我知道你会萦绕在我脑海 烙印在我心中
[02:51.09]我知道你会让我永远留有遗憾 反复设想当初
[02:54.78]烟味在空气中弥漫停留 迟迟未肯消散
[02:58.57]因为我年轻时什么都懂
[03:02.11]我知道我会诅咒你很久
[03:06.00]在商店排队 也会出现幻觉看到你身影
[03:09.60]我知道当你贪恋别处风景的热情褪去 你会想念我的
[03:13.19]你会站在我家门廊的灯前徘徊
[03:16.60]我也知道你会回到我身边
[03:20.85]你会回到我身边的
[03:24.34]你会回到我身边的
[03:27.96]你会回来的
[03:33.74]当我觉得自惭形秽
[03:37.85]犹如被人丢弃在床下的旧羊毛衫时
[03:41.10]你欺骗我 说我是你的最爱
